00077 fsal_status_t CEPHFSAL_test_access(fsal_op_context_t * extcontext,
00078                                    fsal_accessflags_t access_type,
00079                                    fsal_attrib_list_t * object_attributes)
00080 {
00081   cephfsal_op_context_t* context = (cephfsal_op_context_t*) extcontext;
00082   fsal_status_t status;
00083   status = fsal_internal_testAccess(context, access_type, NULL,
00084                                     object_attributes);
00085   Return(status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_test_access);
00086 }
